Why would u risk all the side effects of chemo/drugs when u can cure #Cancer with #Cannabis
#Cut #Burn #Poison is NOT a #Cure - fixing the Endocannabinoid System is!! I bet your oncologist has no idea how to fix your ECS - chances are they’ve never even heard of it! #breastcancer https://t.co/0BuS1H3XKm
